name: UIListContentConfiguration.TextProperties.TextAlignment
desc: Constants that specify the visual alignment of the text.

items.name: case natural
items.desc: The text uses the default alignment that the system associates with the current localization of the app.

items.name: static func == (UIListContentConfiguration.TextProperties.TextAlignment, UIListContentConfiguration.TextProperties.TextAlignment) -> Bool
items.desc: An operator for checking whether two text alignments are equal.

items.name: static func != (UIListContentConfiguration.TextProperties.TextAlignment, UIListContentConfiguration.TextProperties.TextAlignment) -> Bool
items.desc: An operator for checking whether two text alignments are unequal.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the essential components of the text alignment by feeding them into the hasher.
